_sText:
I've been working on this map for a while now, and even though it's finished, it's still got a few flaws. This is simply a beta version of the map to see what people think of it and the way I set it up.

I changed the lighting signifactly from the origonal cs_militia map, I made it much brighter since shadows don't matter as much in dm.

I know that the map has cs_ in it, which generally means a hostage rescue scenario, but that is not the case with this map, I removed the hostages and the hostage rescue zones from the map in order to make it better for the dm mod.

Here's also a video that you can watch to preview the map:
